## 

***SetUp***

```{r}
library(foreach)

B <- 100


Q1 <- foreach(i=1:B, .combine = "rbind") %do% {
      rs_exp <- rexp(B, 1) # generating exponential random variables
      mean_results <- mean(rs_exp) 
      variance_results  <- var(rs_exp)
      c(mean = mean_results,variance = variance_results)
}
```
